solution_line_template: Her total school supplies expenses was ${cost_supply_1} + ${cost_supply_2} = $<<{cost_supply_1}+{cost_supply_2}={total_expenses}>>{total_expenses}.
Hence, the teacher has ${total_budget} - ${total_expenses} = $<<{total_budget}-{total_expenses}={remaining_budget}>>{remaining_budget} remaining budget.
